about_the_game:
This art pack contains all the artworks used in the game in high resolution.
Just go into the game's installation location, find the Art Pack folder, and enjoy!
detailed_description:
This art pack contains all the artworks used in the game in high resolution.
Just go into the game's installation location, find the Art Pack folder, and enjoy!
